title: Did Fifi Box just reveal Andy Lee and Rebecca Harding are engaged?
text:
They've been happily dating since 2015.

And Andy Lee and his girlfriend Rebecca Harding continue to face speculation they are engaged.

On Tuesday morning, the loved-up couple were on breakfast radio program Fifi, Fev and Byron promoting their work with the Cotton On Foundation, when host Fifi Box mentioned an email the show had received locking in the guests.

'Andy and his fiancée Bec?' Radio host Fifi Box appeared to reveal Andy Lee and Rebecca Harding are ENGAGED on her breakfast show on Tuesday

In the correspondence, a publicist named Jack referred to the couple as 'Andy and his fiancée Bec'.

It was at that point the studio erupted in fits of giggles.

'It has been five years [and] we keep going away on these long romantic holidays and Bec hasn't dropped the knee...,' laughed Andy. 'I'm all about equality!'

Blabber mouth: On Tuesday morning, Fifi (pictured) mentioned an email from a publicist named Jack who referred to the couple as 'Andy and his fiancée Bec'

It's not the first time the couple have faced speculation about their relationship.

On September 23, Today show co-host Georgie Gardner attempted to get a definitive answer on where the couple were in their personal life.

'Gosh, Andy. She is wife material. Just saying, she is wife material,' Georgie asked, much to Andy's apparent surprise.

Are they? Aren't they? The couple, who have been dating on and off for five years, have been the subject of engagement rumours for sometime

After a brief pause, the comedian replied: 'Has my mum been texting you guys? What the hell is going on?'

Andy then tried to steer the interview back on track.

Before dropping the subject, Georgie said: 'All I'm saying is that I don't think you should be letting her get away. She is a goodie!'

Feeling the pressure! When asked if he plans to marry Rebecca, the comedian replied: 'Has my mum been texting you guys? What the hell is going on?'

Andy and Rebecca, 27, have been together for the past five years. The couple first met in 2015, when she was working as a part-time waitress in Melbourne.

'I caught her eye and I was attracted to her,' he revealed on his radio show in 2015.

'Just the way she was treating other people, she had a lovely demeanor.

Confession: Andy and Rebecca have been together for five years. The couple first met in 2015, when she was working as a part-time waitress in Melbourne

'I was trying to chat to her, so I was ordering a lot. I had like an hour and a half breakfast and you know I don’t really like that because I like getting in and out in food situations.'

Ever the romantic, he ended up leaving his e-mail address on a napkin for her - and the rest is history.

The loved-up couple went through a brief six-month split in 2016.
authors: Shannon Shipley For Daily Mail Australia
